Articles.Content:
Hi, i bought this game on thursday and my god is it good! i have yet to have a successful landing on the mun but i\'ve had a few (well more than a few!) crashes onto it, jeb would be proud!

i really love the fan fiction section here, some of you are really talented!

If you want to land on the Mun, I recommend watching a tutorial. It beats using debris as a cushion!

And no, I will not give the history of the fan fiction forum.

As a final note,

In before the Captain.

Have a nice boom!

Imandreas

In before Cap\'n Skunky as well :3

Welcome to the KSP forums! My suggestion, while somewhat contradictory to Imandras\', is to just keep trying until you succeed. Heck, I bought the game several months ago, and I couldn\'t land a stock rocket on the Mun without Mechjeb until a few weeks ago. So while it might be faster to just copy a tutorial, you get a much better sense of accomplishment just through trial and error and having fun

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
